Portfolio.title: SmartReel - Hybrid Movie Recommendation System
Portfolio.shortDesc: An advanced machine learning recommendation engine combining collaborative filtering and content-based analysis to address sparse data challenges in movie recommendation systems.
Portfolio.desc:
üìù Description

SmartReel is a backend recommendation engine I developed to solve the problem of poor movie suggestions caused by sparse user data. Many platforms struggle to give accurate recommendations when there's not enough user interaction, so I built this system using a hybrid approach that combines collaborative filtering (with Probabilistic Matrix Factorization) and content-based filtering (using an LSTM-Attention model to understand review content). This combination helps improve both accuracy and relevance in recommendations.

An advanced backend recommendation engine that solves the sparse data problem in movie recommendation systems.

üéØ Problem Statement

Many platforms struggle with accurate recommendations due to insufficient user interaction data, leading to poor user experience and engagement.

üß† AI/ML Approach

  • Collaborative Filtering: Probabilistic Matrix Factorization for user behavior analysis
  • Content-Based Filtering: LSTM-Attention model for review sentiment analysis
  • Hybrid System: Combines both approaches for optimal accuracy

üìä Key Improvements

  • Enhanced recommendation accuracy
  • Better handling of cold start problems
  • Improved relevance through review analysis
  • Scalable architecture for large datasets
